name: chi_squared_test_from_database
description: Perform a chi-squared test on two categorical columns from a SQLite database.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

from_clause.description: SQL FROM clause (table name or JOIN expression).

col1.description: First categorical column (will be converted to string).

col2.description: Second categorical column (will be converted to string).

where_clause.description: Optional SQL WHERE clause (excluding the 'WHERE' keyword).

where_params.description: Optional list of parameters to be used in the WHERE clause.

show_contingency.description: Whether to return the contingency table used in the test.

show_interpretation.description: Whether to return a human-readable interpretation of the result.
